Folk songs, dances renewed
articles.content:
Folk songs, dances renewed 
    Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- Folk songs "Hwanghaesan Tharyong", "Bird Tharyong" and "Nurigae Tharyong" and folk dances "Sanjo Dance", "Tune and Dance" and "Sorceress Dance" have been renewed to suit national characteristics and aesthetic sense of the time.
The Korean Institute of National Music and Dance already renewed more than 400 folk songs including "Yangsando", "Spinning Wheel Tharyong" and "Ryonggangginari", and a lot of folk dances including "Hoe Dance".    
 The institute has also compiled such books as "Complete Collection of Korean National Music" and "Collection of Treatises on Songs of Enlightenment Period".
